name: thanklessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without being thanked for something, especially for doing something difficult or unpleasant: Carers work tirelessly, and often thanklessly, looking after friends and family members. They're working harder than their spouses, and more thanklessly.
without thanking someone or being grateful for what they have done: This tender devotion was somewhat thanklessly received. Humans will take and take thanklessly and thoughtlessly from their environment until all the earth's resources are gone.
More examplesFewer examplesThey toiled away thanklessly for days.She spent years thanklessly looking after Jean.His mother was proud of his money, which she took quickly and thanklessly.
